name: Aimless (Rhett Pilcher)
description:
My second game! Aimless is a small metroidvania with a rougelike twist. Explore your environment, unlock abilities, conquer platforming challenges, and fight monsters until you find your way to the end! This game has standard gamepad support.

Made from June 20th, 2022 - August 27, 2022. Original music by Ecremprown (me) and Tokiru.

Tips/know issues:

- If you randomly lose the ability to jump, press the jump button while paused and then unpause

- If you are stuck and not sure how to make progress, go back to the shop and read the ability descriptions more carefully

- Gamepad controls are kinda janky because of itch and WebGL so keyboard is probably best for now but I'll try to fix it soon
